member.name: T:VectorMath.Vector3
member.summary: A class representing a 3-element vector using doubles.

member.name: F:VectorMath.Vector3.X
member.summary: Gets or sets the X property

member.name: F:VectorMath.Vector3.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y property

member.name: F:VectorMath.Vector3.Z
member.summary: Gets or sets the Z property

member.name: M:VectorMath.Vector3.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of Vector3 with X, Y, and Z properties set to 0.

member.name: M:VectorMath.Vector3.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of Vector3 with the supplied values for X, Y, and Z. A double precision number for the x component of the vector. A double precision number for the y component of the vector. A double precision number for the z component of the vector.
